comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Woa! Are you sure that's not Kathi Vito on that bike? Has she been moonlighting?

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I almost goaded into riding today by The Replacement, but I'm afraid I need to go home to tend to some sick ones. Have fun.

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: I must say, that I experienced more trash (via dirt on the road) than talk... I was expecting more from you guys. ->Find->Replace
